meanings.definition: The act of not accepting something.
meanings.sent1: Her nonacceptances of the invitation were due to a prior commitment.
meanings.sent2: The company experienced multiple nonacceptances of the new policy.
meanings.sent3: His nonacceptances of vegetables always made his friends laugh.
meanings.sent4: The nonacceptances of reality were like a shield against the harsh truth.
meanings.sent5: The nonacceptances of the apology lingered in the air, unresolved.

meanings.definition: Instances of refusing to accept something.
meanings.sent1: The nonacceptances of the terms led to a breakdown in negotiations.
meanings.sent2: There were several nonacceptances of the award by the recipients.
meanings.sent3: The nonacceptances of the challenge sparked a competitive spirit.
meanings.sent4: Her nonacceptances of defeat were legendary among her peers.
meanings.sent5: The nonacceptances of the truth created a barrier to understanding.
